Name: Diamond Mirage
About the game: A sexy BL / Yaoi fantasy tale in which you follow Ellyn - an innocent young elf who becomes a slave and discovers the world of pleasure. The game has a total of 28 CGs with variations 92,000 word story Two main endings and three mini-endings Numerous erotic encounters A richly detailed slave's tale forms the core of this grim fantasy novel Unlocked artwork can be accessed in a gallery
